author: Tay Yong Kwang J:
casename: Lim Pei Ni Charissa v Public Prosecutor
counsel: Edmond Pereira (Edmond Pereira & Partners) for the appellant; Christina Koh (Deputy Public Prosecutor) for the respondent
tags-parsed: Criminal Procedure and Sentencing/Appeal/Appellant convicted on seven charges for abetment of cheating offences based on trial judge's findings of fact/Trial judge preferring prosecution witnesses' version of facts/Whether trial judge erring in findings of fact and assessment of veracity and credibility of witnesses/Whether appellant's conviction should be set aside

Criminal Procedure and Sentencing/Sentencing/Young offenders/Appellant convicted on seven charges for abetment of cheating offences/Appellant between 17 and 18 years old at time of offences/Factors to consider when deciding whether appellant should be sentenced to probation rather than imprisonment
